alert.note: Alert for Barry; Jasper; Lawrence; McDonald; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:59AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Newton, McDonald, Barry, Lawrence and southern Jasper Counties through 145 AM CST... At 1259 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Diamond to 7 miles north of Bella Vista to near Tontitown. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Joplin, Carthage, Neosho, Webb City, Roaring River State Park, Big Sugar Creek State Park, Monett, Aurora, Carl Junction, Mount Vernon, Cassville, Oronogo, Granby, Anderson, Carterville, Duquesne, Sarcoxie, Pierce City, Goodman and Duenweg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 8 and 49. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
